title: BRIEF-Famous Brands Says Difficult Trading Conditions Persisted In South Africa And UK
text:
BRIEF-Famous Brands Says Difficult Trading Conditions Persisted In South Africa And UK

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 09:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Famous Brands Says Difficult Trading Conditions Persisted In South Africa And UK Sept 11 (Reuters) - Famous Brands Ltd : * JSE: FBR - VOLUNTARY PERFORMANCE UPDATE * FAMOUS BRANDS LTD - REVENUE REPORTED FOR REVIEW PERIOD IS IN LINE WITH MANAGEMENT'S EXPECTATIONS * FAMOUS BRANDS - DIFFICULT TRADING CONDITIONS PERSISTED ACROSS GROUP'S PRIMARY MARKETS IN SA AND UK * FAMOUS BRANDS -DIFFICULT TRADING CONDITIONS MARKETS IN SA & UK, DUE TO SUBDUED CONSUMER SENTIMENT, SPEND, INTENSE COMPETITOR ACTIVITY, MARGIN PRESSURE * FAMOUS BRANDS- GROWTH WAS RECORDED ACROSS BRANDS DIVISION IN SA AND AME, BUT SUPPLY CHAIN DIVISION FARED LESS WELL FOR 26-WEEK ENDED 25 AUGUST * FAMOUS BRANDS LTD - "ON BALANCE, GROUP WILL DELIVER SATISFACTORY RESULTS" FOR 26-WEEK PERIOD ENDED 25 AUGUST 2019

BRIEF-Famous Brands Says Difficult Trading Conditions Persisted In South Africa And UK
